title: Structural Equation Modeling Analysis for Enhancing Online Learning Effectiveness

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Blended instruction utilizing digital devices for social studies experts

learning_goals: Students can explain methods for analyzing online learning effectiveness using structural equation modeling (SEM)
Learners can empirically analyze the relationship between online learning behaviors (OLB) and effectiveness (OLE) using data
Participants can model how learner attitudes, self-efficacy, and emotions influence online learning effectiveness
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
